greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Multiplicative with a(p^e) = (p^(2*e+2)-p^(e+1)-p^e+p)/(p^2-1).
comment: If y is squarefree (cf. A005117(n)) then A062952(y)=y^2. - _Benoit Cloitre_, Apr 16 2002
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: f[p_, e_] := (p^(2*e+2)-p^(e+1)-p^e+p)/(p^2-1); a[1] = 1; a[n_] := Times @@ (f @@@ FactorInteger[n]); Array[a, 50] (* _Amiram Eldar_, Jul 31 2019 *)
program: (PARI) a(n) = sumdiv(n, d, eulerphi(d)*sigma(d)) \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jun 17 2013
results.author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Jul 21 2001
